Company Description

At Allergan Aesthetics, an AbbVie company, we develop, manufacture, and market a portfolio of leading aesthetics brands and products. Our aesthetics portfolio includes facial injectables, body contouring, plastics, skin care, and more. Our goal is to consistently provide our customers with innovation, education, exceptional service, and a commitment to excellence, all with a personal touch. For more information, visit https://global.allerganaesthetics.com/. Follow Allergan Aesthetics on LinkedIn.

JOB SUMMARY:

Reporting to the Country Manager, AA â LENWA, role will be responsible for:

Strategically plan, organize, and lead the Allergan Aesthetic marketing team across LENWA to meet or exceed the defined sales, profit, and market share goals and growth objectives through effective, high-quality marketing and promotional plan execution. Enable the organization to make effective decisions based on insights gathered from data, market research, and market intelligence to capitalize on the most sizeable opportunities.

Responsible for leading, managing, coaching, and developing a competent and committed Aesthetic marketing team. Actively pursues the development and growth of the marketing team.

Owns & manages the marketing team budgets and expense targets.

As a key member of the AA LENWA leadership team the marketing lead plays a critical role in strategizing regarding the direction of the AA business operation, bring innovation, engaging employees, achieving financial goals and maintaining the highest standard of compliance.
